channel.title: Adding items into correct equip spots!
channel.description: ok where do i put the ids for hoods is it fullhelm, hats or masks? some1 plz help me

item.title: Adding items into correct equip spots!

item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“hippie408, post:3, topic:222056”]No…you forgot that YOU HAVE TO DO THE SAME THING TO ITEM4.JAVA[/quote]Why everone has now item4.java file? I don’t have one and the items appear in correct spots when I add them in item.java!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items into correct equip spots!
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“Enjoi Sk8, post:1, topic:222056”]ok where do i put the ids for hoods is it fullhelm, hats or masks? some1 plz help me[/quote]Open item.java with notepad and there are lines like body, legs fullhelm, hats add the item ids you want to the right lines and remember to add ,'s right. All other ids that arent there are weapons.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2008, 03:53:08 am[/size][hr]If it doesn’t work in item.java then try item4.java if you hav it.

Read full topic
